oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Golden Jubilee Pin, 1865-1915
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Golden Jubilee Pin from the General Association of Colored Baptists in Kentucky. The item reads, "one Lord, one Faith, and one Baptism" The object includes images of Henry Adams, 1st moderator, and Dr. C. H. Parrish, present moderator.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
